body: Awesome, looking forward for it! ...a note in case any fellow honeybee user goes through the same issue with Grizzly Bear. The solution was to unblock the gbXML files saved in the drive C: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/I0PaAyo4W*aw53UgGXsoUeov3YKHo9-tLewn29FXR*R7COiyiQnvku2ORju0VukIfbdtEWHLq67WeCzgF6qN2rqfOGWfqJkT/GrizzlyBear_Issue.png)
